trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Remove-PSDrive
trans-unit.target: Remove-PSDrive

trans-unit.source: Remove-PSDrive
trans-unit.target: Remove-PSDrive

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Deletes temporary Windows PowerShell drives and disconnects mapped network drives.
trans-unit.target: 删除临时 Windows PowerShell 驱动器并断开连接映射的网络驱动器。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Name (Default)
trans-unit.target: 名称 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralName
trans-unit.target: LiteralName

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Remove-PSDrive** cmdlet deletes temporary Windows PowerShell drives that were created by using the New-PSDrive cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-psdrive** cmdlet 删除由使用 New-psdrive cmdlet 创建的临时 Windows PowerShell 驱动器。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, **Remove-PSDrive** also disconnects mapped network drives, including, but not limited to, drives created by using the *Persist* parameter of **New-PSDrive**.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始 **Remove-psdrive** 还会断开连接映射的网络驱动器，包括但不是限于通过创建驱动器 *Persist* 参数 **New-psdrive**。

trans-unit.source: **Remove-PSDrive** cannot delete Windows physical or logical drives.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-psdrive** 无法删除 Windows 物理或逻辑驱动器。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, when an external drive is connected to the computer, Windows PowerShell automatically adds a PSDrive to the file system that represents the new drive.
trans-unit.target: 当外部驱动器连接到计算机时，从在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，Windows PowerShell 自动将 PSDrive 添加到代表新驱动器的文件系统。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to restart Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 不需要重新启动 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when an external drive is disconnected from the computer, Windows PowerShell automatically deletes the PSDrive that represents the removed drive.
trans-unit.target: 简单来说，当从计算机断开连接外部驱动器时，Windows PowerShell 会自动删除代表删除的驱动器的 PSDrive。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Remove a file system drive
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 删除文件系统驱动器

trans-unit.source: This command removes a temporary file system drive named smp.
trans-unit.target: 此命令删除一个名为 smp 的临时文件系统驱动器。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Remove mapped network drives
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 删除映射的网络驱动器

trans-unit.source: This command disconnects the X: mapped network drive that was created in File Explorer and the S: mapped network drive that was created by using the *Persist* parameter of the New-PSDrive cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令断开连接在文件资源管理器中创建的 x︰ 映射网络驱动器和通过使用创建的 s︰ 映射网络驱动器 *Persist* New-psdrive cmdlet 参数。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-PSDrive cmdlet to get the drives and **Remove-PSDrive** to disconnect them.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Get-psdrive cmdlet 来获取驱动器和 **Remove-psdrive** 断开其连接。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Removes the current Windows PowerShell drive.
trans-unit.target: 删除当前 Windows PowerShell 驱动器。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralName
trans-unit.target: -LiteralName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定驱动器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of *LiteralName* is used exactly as typed.
trans-unit.target: 值 *LiteralName* 键入的形式使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配字符。

trans-unit.source: If the name includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks instruct Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号会告知 Windows PowerShell 不要将任意字符解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the names of the drives to remove.
trans-unit.target: 指定要删除的驱动器的名称。

trans-unit.source: Do not type a colon (:) after the drive name.
trans-unit.target: 请不要在驱动器名称后面键入冒号 (:)。

trans-unit.source: -PSProvider
trans-unit.target: -PSProvider

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of **PSProvider** objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数组 **PSProvider** 对象。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet removes and disconnects all of the drives associated with the specified Windows PowerShell provider.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 删除并断开连接所有与指定的 Windows PowerShell 提供程序相关联的驱动器。

trans-unit.source: -Scope
trans-unit.target: 作用域

trans-unit.source: Specifies an index that identifies the scope from which the drive is being removed.
trans-unit.target: 指定标识从中删除驱动器的作用域的索引。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅包括在活动事务中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题后面的

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSDriveInfo
trans-unit.target: 即 System.Management.Automation.PSDriveInfo

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a drive object, such as one from the Get-PSDrive cmdlet, to the this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递一个驱动器对象，例如从 Get-psdrive cmdlet，此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不返回任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: **Remove-PSDrive** is designed to work with the data exposed by any Windows PowerShell provider.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-psdrive** 用于处理由任何 Windows PowerShell 提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers in your session, use the Get-PSProvider cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在会话中列出的提供程序，使用 Get-psprovider cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113250).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113250)。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Get-PSDrive
